head.supplied: Melbourne bot. Gard ¶ August 16th 1862 ¶ Sir ¶ ¶ I have the honor to inform you, that at a meeting of the Trustees of the Royal Park held on the 14th inst., you have been entrusted (until further not...

div.p: A345 Royal Park Zoological Society letter copy and minute book, p. 4, Mitchell Library, State Library of New South Wales, Sydney.
See also M to G. Sprigg, 16 August 1862. Melbourne bot. Gard

I have the honor to inform you, that at a meeting of the Trustees of the Royal Park held on the 14th inst., you have been entrusted (until further notice and without additional renumeration) with the duty of acting as Ranger of the Royal Park, and you are thereby empowered to take legal proceedings against any persons, who may infringe on the rules established under the sanction of the Trustees of the Royal Park.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: I have the honor to be

div.p:
Sec. to the Trust. of Roy. Park.
See also M to J. O'Shanassy, 16 August 1862 (in this edition as 62-08-16b).
Superintendent of the Zoolog. Garden at the Royal Park
